ApplicantNameValidation: Name length should at least 5 Characters and not more than 50 Characters
ApplicantFamilyNameValidation: Family name length should at least 5 Characters and not more than 50 Characters
ApplicantAddressValidation: Address length should at least 10 Characters and not more than 50 Characters
ApplicantHiredValidation: Provide if applicant hired or not
